thread.title: BRIEF-Xiamen King Long Motor Expects To Return To Net Profit Of About 460 Million Yuan In 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Xiamen King Long Motor Expects To Return To Net Profit Of About 460 Million Yuan In 2017

organizations.name: xiamen king long motor group co ltd

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Xiamen King Long Motor Group Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT EXPECTS TO RETURN TO NET PROFIT OF ABOUT 460 MILLION YUAN ($72.84 million)IN 2017 VERSUS NET LOSS OF 719 MILLION YUAN YEAR AGO Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2DMCPWG Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3156 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
